FuncDef: The display mld-snooping qinq-port-info interface command displays interface entries about multicast groups on a specified QinQ or dot1q VLAN tag termination sub-interface where both Layer 2 and Layer 3 services are deployed.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an interface type added to a multicast group.
-

Specifies an interface number added to a multicast group.
-

Specifies the name of an interface.
-

Specifies the IPv6 address of a multicast group.
The value is a 32-digit hexadecimal number, in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X. The value ranges from FF00:: to FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display mld-snooping qinq-port-info interface gigabitethernet1/0/1.1 group-address FF15::1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To display interface entries about multicast groups on a specified QinQ/dot1q VLAN tag termination sub-interface where both Layer 2 and Layer 3 services are deployed, run the display mld-snooping qinq-port-info command.
When you run this command:
If no optional parameter is specified, interface entries about all multicast groups on the sub-interface are displayed.If group-address is specified, interface entries about the specified multicast group on the sub-interface are displayed.
